response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and functionality, it's valued at $150 by me. Considering its worth to you might be around $100, I'm offering it to you for $120. This way, both parties can benefit - you get a great deal on a valuable item, and I secure a sale. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 120}
